page.title: 06VILLAGE SHOPS (1)
page.content: {N & I S Casey's }is the only grocers shop in Great Longstone. They sell newspapers, groceries, food and drinks .The buiding is 53 years old.Mr Casey has been in business for 24 years. Before the shop was there the building was a stable. { The Bay Tree }is a small tea room with lots of cakes and biscuits and hand made craft work like sewing and wood work and jumpers.It is our only tea shop or little restaurant in Great Longstone.The Bay Tree has been in business for about 2 years. Before the Bay Tree was there it used to be a post office and in a recent time it was a grocery shop.
